ygData.subject: Improving Weapon Skills
ygData.msgSnippet: ... did this with one group of 3 crits for over an hour and got absolutely 0 increase in bare hand skill (still at 10 or 11)! What is going on am I to start on
ygData.messageBody:
On May 21 Rich Mulawa wrote:

>> I
did this with one group of 3 crits for over an hour and got absolutely 0
increase in bare hand skill (still at 10 or 11)!

What is going on am I to start on /con blue creatures at level 9. If so
and had I known (ie if the manual had any value at all) I would have been
training 1H skills much early when the creatures could not kill me in 2 or
3 blows!

Can anyone confirm this and/or give suggestions on how at this point (9th)
I can improve my 1H fighting skills?<<

I had been doing the same thing until recently. After reading the
recommendations on this list, I picked up a cracked staff and got a Snake
Fang out of mothballs...err...the bank where it had been gathering dust. I went
to the Goblin Warrior camp in butcherblock with my level 9 hunting partner (I
was level 10 at the time) who, luckily for me, is a cleric. I was able to bring 1h
blunt form 0 to max of 33 in 2 days of playing, then I did the same for my
piercing skill.. tho that was at 17 when I started so didn't take as long. It's
definitely doable.

Good luck. :)

Iggie
Level 11 Gnome wizard
Cazic Thule
